sys_ui_message.message:
You can contact the pension fund on 0860 422 777 to request your pension fund balance, benefits statement or to find out more about withdrawing your pension.
To find out how your pension fund savings are growing in our fund, please [register/login](https://www.alexforbes.com/za/en/global/home-global.html) on the Pension Fund Member Web.
Take a look at the [knowledge article](https://absahr.service-now.com/myhrportal?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0010221) to find out more about the South Africa Pension Fund, Retirement and Death Benefits.
